EmailTemplate.name: Batch Approval
EmailTemplate.Body:
$launcher is requesting approval to run in a batch request file.
#if ( $approvalSet.items ) #foreach ($item in $approvalSet.items) Content Preview: $item.displayValue #end #end
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying approvers when they need to approve a request made through LCM. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: approvalSet
Argument.Description: The ApprovalSet object contained in the work item.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Changes requested to $identityDisplayName need approval
